info.title: ENSApi APIs
info.description: APIs for ENS resolution, navigating the ENS nameforest, and metadata about an ENSNode

tags.name: Resolution
tags.description: APIs for resolving ENS names and addresses

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: APIs for indexing status, configuration, and realtime monitoring

tags.name: Explore
tags.description: APIs for exploring the indexed state of ENS, including name tokens and registrar actions

tags.name: ENSAwards
tags.description: APIs for ENSAwards functionality, including referrer data

get.description: Gets the public config of the ENSApi instance
Returns the indexing status snapshot most recently captured from ENSIndexer
Returns name tokens for the requested identifier (domainId or name)

503.description: Service unavailable - Name Tokens API prerequisites not met (indexing status not ready or required plugins not activated)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: ENS name to look up tokens for

get.description: Returns all registrar actions with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: withReferral
parameters.description: Filter to only include actions with referrals

parameters.name: beginTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter actions at or after this Unix timestamp

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter actions at or before this Unix timestamp

get.summary: Get Registrar Actions by Parent Node
get.description: Returns registrar actions filtered by parent node hash with optional additional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: parentNode
parameters.description: Parent node to filter registrar actions

parameters.name: withReferral
parameters.description: Filter to only include actions with referrals

parameters.name: beginTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter actions at or after this Unix timestamp

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter actions at or before this Unix timestamp

get.description: Resolves ENS records for a given name
Resolves a primary name for a given `address` and `chainId`
Resolves all primary names for a given address across multiple chains
Returns a paginated page from the referrer leaderboard
Returns detailed information for a specific referrer by address

503.description: Service unavailable - referrer leaderboard data not yet cached

get.description: Checks if the indexing progress is guaranteed to be within a requested worst-case distance of realtime

200.description: Indexing progress is guaranteed to be within the requested distance of realtime

503.description: Indexing progress is not guaranteed to be within the requested distance of realtime or indexing status unavailable

parameters.name: maxWorstCaseDistance
parameters.description: Maximum acceptable worst-case indexing distance in seconds
